Actions.description: The available actions for this Resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this Resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this Resource.
Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this Resource.

OemActions.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this Resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this Resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

PCIeLinks.description: The links to other Resources that are related to this Resource.
PCIeLinks.longDescription: The Redfish Specification-described type shall contain links to Resources related to but not subordinate to this Resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties contained in this object shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

PCIeDevice.description: An array of links to the PCIe devices contained in this slot.
PCIeDevice.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of links to the Resources of the PCIeDevice type with which this physical slot is associated.  If the Status.State of this slot is `Absent`, this property shall not appear in the Resource.

PCIeSlot.description: This type defines information for a PCIe slot.
PCIeSlot.longDescription: These properties shall contain the definition for a PCIe Slot for a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

HotPluggable.description: An indication of whether this PCIe slot supports hotplug.
HotPluggable.longDescription: This property shall contain indicating whether this PCIe slot supports hotplug.

Lanes.description: The number of PCIe lanes supported by this slot.
Lanes.longDescription: This property shall contain the maximum number of PCIe lanes supported by the slot.

Links.description: The links to other Resources that are related to this Resource.
Links.longDescription: The Redfish Specification-described type shall contain links to Resources related to but not subordinate to this Resource.

Location.description: The location of the PCIe slot.
Location.longDescription: This property shall contain part location information, including a ServiceLable of the associated PCIe Slot.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties contained in this object shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

PCIeType.description: The PCIe specification supported by this slot.
PCIeType.longDescription: This property shall contain the maximum PCIe specification that this slot supports.

SlotType.description: The PCIe slot type for this slot.
SlotType.longDescription: This property shall contain the slot type as specified by the PCIe specification.

Status.description: The status and health of the Resource and its subordinate or dependent Resources.
Status.longDescription: This property shall contain any status or health properties of the Resource.

PCIeSlots.description: The PCIeSlots schema describes PCIe slot properties.
PCIeSlots.longDescription: This Resource shall represent a set of PCIe slot information for a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this Resource.
Actions.longDescription: This property shall contain the available actions for this Resource.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

Slots.description: An array of PCI Slot information.
Slots.longDescription: This array shall contain an entry for each PCIe slot, including empty slots (with no device or card installed).

title: #PCIeSlots.v1_1_1.PCIeSlots
